title: Express Entry Draw: 4,500 ITAs Issued at CRS 481
summary: IRCC conducted another Express Entry draw targeting Canadian Experience Class candidates with a minimum CRS score of 481.

title: New Language Requirements for PNP Applications
summary: Several provinces have updated their language proficiency requirements for Provincial Nominee Program applications.

title: Study Permit Processing Times Updated
summary: IRCC has updated processing times for study permit applications from various countries. Current estimates range from 4-12 weeks.

title: Immigration Fee Increases Effective January 2025
summary: New government fees for various immigration applications will take effect starting January 1, 2025.

title: OINP Updates Tech Draw Requirements
summary: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program announces updated criteria for technology sector nominations under Express Entry.

title: Work Permit Extensions Streamlined
summary: IRCC introduces simplified process for certain work permit extensions to reduce processing delays.

title: Visitor Visa Processing Improvements
summary: Enhanced digital processing capabilities lead to faster visitor visa application reviews for most countries.

title: LMIA Fee Structure Review Announced
summary: Employment and Social Development Canada announces review of LMIA application fees and processing procedures.
